desc: Backlinks with 100% white hat techniques only!- Links must be strictly from Google PR4+ pages - internal pages (mostly from Indian web sites)- Links must be permanent. You agree to replace any links which are removed within 6 months after placement.- One link per domain.- Links must be placed on proper PR4+ web pages, either on home page or internal pages. Page must be linked with Home page.- We will provide anchor text for all the backlinks.- Page must not be dis-allowed by [url removed, login to view]- The linking page must have no more than 50 outbound links.- All links must be static and standard href type links.- Only links from relevant sites will be accepted.- Domains must be from different IP addresses and different Class-C IP addresses.- Link pages and our text links must be visible, readable, indexable and do-follow.- Link pages must be indexed and cached by Google, Yahoo and Bing within last 20 days.- Backlinks must be search engine friendly, that is no redirects, cloaking and other practices

desc: We would like to partner with a Call Center in the US or abroad.  We are looking for ambitious closers who are excited to sell.Revolutionary website management product!  No set-up fees.  No commitments (low monthly fee).Our website management plans are the most feature rich, service oriented and cost effective products on the market.  Our products outshine all the others: $10,000 website design and ongoing website management, hosting and updates for ONLY $350 per month!  No one else offers this!  We take care of everything website for our clients (custom design, high speed server hosting, SEO, SSL, custom text, graphic design, updates, management and more)… helping our clients get more customers and make more money.We are looking for call center reps to sell our products to medical professionals within the US.  You would start with one industry exclusively (you will be the only call center marketing to this industry - i.e. dental).EASY sales for a quality sales team!•	Commission: You make $200 for every sale•	Closing Incentive: You can offer the customer a $100 off the first month•	Promo Code: You will receive a unique code that gives the customer their savings and guarantees your commission•	Call Center Budget: Our estimated budget is a minimum of $10,000 paid in commissions each monthYou MUST have ALL of the following qualification!  NO EXCEPTIONS!!•	You must own your own calling equipment and/or auto dialer•	Manage your own reps•	Have the ability for our team to speak to you via skype or phone in real time•	Your reps must have professional and clear English skill (they are speaking with businesses)•	Must be able to read English•	Must have great communication skills•	Must have prior business to business outgoing calling experience•	Your reps must be able to work normal US business hoursThis is a PAY FOR PERFORMANCE partnership!  If you do not agree to pay for performance, then please do NOT apply.  Do not ask us to pay hourly or pay for supplies.  Reps MUST be able to CLOSE DEALS!We know that our product is incredible, cost-effective and needed.  We know that quality closers will make a lot of money.  We are willing to pay HUGE percentages because we know how amazing our services are.If your team meets all the requirements and can be ready immediately, then please apply or message us with…•	Your experience•	Where you are located•	Confirmation that you meet all the requirementsPut $200 as your bid if you agree to our commission structure and our terms.If hired, we will provide you complete details about our products and be available to answer any questions you might have about the sales process to share with your reps.  Thank you for the interest.
